Title: Requires the department of health to post on its website certain data relating to healthcare personnel
Summary: Requires the department of health to post on its website certain data relating to the total number of personnel employed or affiliated with certain health care facilities, personnel who are no longer employed by such facilities, and the reason for such personnel leaving such employment, the number of requested personnel from the New York state surge and flex operations center, and the number of personnel employed as a result of such center.
LawCode: Add ยง206-c, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to requiring the department of health to post on its website certain data relating to personnel employed or affiliated with health care facilities
